user_instruction: 'Tell John to send a group email to me (all-staff@innosoft.com) containing the latest updates on our office environment and workflow changes, and remind him to review his Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

Could you please send a group email to all-staff@innosoft.com with the most recent updates on our office environment and any workflow changes that affect everyone?  
When you have a moment, please review your Gmail and Notion spaces for the latest details you’ll need to include.

Thank you for keeping us informed!

Best,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
Hi John,

Could you please send a group email to all-staff@innosoft.com with the most recent updates on our office environment and any workflow changes that affect everyone?  
When you have a moment, please review your Gmail and Notion spaces for the latest details you’ll need to include.

Thank you for keeping us informed!

[Your Name]
